core_meaning: 通过努力完成某事 → 达成目标
frequency: 中高级常用词汇，学术、商务和日常都用

history.origin: 来自法语 achever（完成、结束），源于拉丁语 ad + caput（到头、到结尾）。
history.story: 中世纪骑士完成训练或比赛后被授予徽章，引申为达成、完成。

references.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
references.note: 影片主题围绕实现目标，体现 achieve 精神

references.author: Napoleon Hill
references.content: What the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

references.author: Zig Ziglar
references.content: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

examples.en: She achieved all her goals for this year.
examples.cn: 她实现了今年的所有目标。

examples.en: He achieved great success in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 他在科技行业取得了巨大成功。

examples.en: It is difficult to achieve such a high score on the exam.
examples.cn: 在考试中取得如此高的分数很难。

quotes: Napoleon Hill: What the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
Zig Ziglar: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
daily_usage: 商务: We must achieve the quarterly targets.
学术: The researchers achieved a breakthrough in AI.

key_points: 核心含义：通过努力完成 → 达成目标
结合现代用法、例句和名人引用记忆

animations: 单词卡片翻转显示词根和释义
进度条记录学习完成度
